name: punch-in
description: A tiny Electron app to punch in/out per project, with a Mac menu bar (tray) item showing the current project and elapsed time, plus a simple 2-screen UI (Timer & Reports).

scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:ui && tsc && npm run copy:assets
scripts.package: ENV=production npm run build && electron-packager . PunchIn --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --out=out --icon=img/icon.icns --asar --overwrite --extra-resource=dist/renderer
scripts.copy:assets: cp src/renderer/*.svg dist && cp img/logo.png dist && cp img/icon.icns dist || true
scripts.clean: npm run -s clean:dist && npm run -s clean:next && npm run -s clean:node && npm ci -s && npm run -s clean:watchman

author: Brandon Shoop <brandon@aglflorida.com>
